sn35.165:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.165:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.165:4.3: “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṃ passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti?
sn35.165:5.1: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, aniccato jānato passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.165:5.2: Rūpe aniccato jānato passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.165:5.3: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccato jānato passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.165:5.4: Cakkhusamphassaṃ aniccato jānato passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyati … pe …
sn35.165:5.5: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyati.
sn35.165:5.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato micchādiṭṭhi pahīyatī”ti.
